title: CHEMICAL HAZARD CLASSIFICATION
fullText:
The chemical hazard classification shall be determined by reference to Table 3.1.
NOTE 1 The chemical hazard classification is used to determine the ventilation requirements for the battery system.
NOTE 2 The chemical hazard classification is used to determine the PPE requirements for personnel working on or near the battery system.
NOTE 3 The chemical hazard classification is used to determine the spill containment requirements for the battery system.
